definition: having or showing undue or excessive pride in one's appearance or achievements : conceited
marked by futility or ineffectualness : unsuccessful, useless
having no real value : idle, worthless
to no end : without success or result
in an irreverent or blasphemous manner, — see also take in vain
examples: Being a religion writer, I have always tried to avoid using the Lord's name in vain. I have not always succeeded.
